channel.title: Customer-Managed Keys on Sujith Quintelier
channel.description: Recent content in Customer-Managed Keys on Sujith Quintelier

item.title: azure: [Launched] Generally Available: Cross-tenant customer-managed keys for Azure NetApp Files volume encryption
item.description:
Azure NetApp Files now generally supports cross-tenant customer-managed keys (CMK) for volume encryption, letting customers use and control their own encryption keys across different Azure tenancies to increase control and flexibility.

  • Source: Azure Updates

item.title: azure: [In preview] Public Preview: Azure Cosmos DB for MongoDB (vCore) encryption with customer-managed key
item.description:
Azure Cosmos DB for MongoDB (vCore) now supports encryption with customer-managed keys in public preview, adding to the existing service-managed key encryption.

  • Source: Azure Updates
